scripts.build-sass: rm -rf public/styles.css && sass --no-source-map ../../node_modules/@govuk-one-login/frontend-language-toggle/src/stylesheet/styles.css public/stylesheets/application-ifsdjkn.css --style compressed && sass --no-source-map ../../node_modules/govuk-frontend/govuk/all.scss public/stylesheets/govuk-frontend.css --style compressed && sass --no-source-map ../../node_modules/@govuk-one-login/frontend-ui/build/all.css public/stylesheets/frontendUi.css --style compressed
scripts.precommit: npm run test && npm run format && git add .
scripts.test:integration:ci: npx playwright install --with-deps && start-server-and-test start http://localhost:3000 test:integration
